post.body: Nice bar! I can hear the clinking already...
I will have to put up some pics of my place...we gutted to the bones and built in 04...Cool to see projects outside work "stuff"
@exitcreative Party at Russ's! Nice man cave man!
Dig the new doo!
night shifters unite!
5D MK11 footage gorgeous...http://vimeo.com/2711157
Editing videos for a website navigation bar...
When I was editing a doc on a G4, we used to call them "render benders"...and drink beer! Now...we tweet.
Cool...good luck!
have you rendered all (option-r)? Worth a try, just a blind suggestion...
fcp preferences perhaps?
sucks about the water pipe Chris..if you need help, I know someone in the disaster clean up biz who could help..let me know
@mattkern Great podcast with @scottyiseri...congrats on your launch of Midwest Media Now http://is.gd/erXi
I believe u need to jailbreak your iPhone to use qik
Finished two web videos...alas blog post will have to wait...g'night all night shifters.
RT @andykaufman: RT @tboard | watching the MN recount on the uptake, citizens media at it's best. http://bit.ly/mTzs
RT @MarketingProfs: @Armano People confuse us a lot. It's the brains. The looks. The ever-present 5 o'clock shadow... oh, wait. "Armanarchy"
Streaming the Al Franken/Norm Coleman recount live via theuptake http://is.gd/1oAM
RT @JasonBarnett: Join the near 1000 people watching #MNRecount on http://theuptake.org/ It's a wild and crazy time!
I have two video banners and 1 WAY overdue blog post to do today...anybody else cranking away on a "due project" today? Wanna race?
